title: Cognitive Load-Optimized Microlearning Course for Medical Simulation Education

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Step-by-step simulation education utilizing smartphone-based learning environments. Modular design considering learners’ cognitive load

learning_goals: Learners can perform the 3-step basic medical protocol (history-taking, physical examination, initial medical record documentation) with 80% accuracy
Learners can demonstrate appropriate initial responses to three common emergency scenarios (respiratory distress, hemorrhage, decreased consciousness) in a simulation environment
Learners can process complex medical procedures 20% more efficiently by applying cognitive load management techniques (chunking, visual structuring)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
